definition: head/chief/first (occasion, thing etc)/classifier for poems, songs etc
letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China

pinyin: shou3 zi4 mu3 pin1 yin1 ci2

sentences.english: YOLO is an acronym for "you only live once".
sentences.chinese: YOLO是“你只活一次”的英文首字母缩写。

sentences.english: The first letter of a phrase or song refrain.
sentences.chinese: 避免用一个词组或一首歌名的首字母。

sentences.english: His initials were engraved on the cigarette case.
sentences.chinese: 他姓名的首字母刻在香烟盒上。

sentences.english: The cigarette case was engraved with his initials.
sentences.chinese: 这香烟盒上刻著他姓名的首字母。

sentences.english: Capitalizes the first letter of words in the selection .
sentences.chinese: 将所选内容中文本单词的首字母改为大写。

sentences.english: He carried a leather briefcase embossed with his initials.
sentences.chinese: 他带着一个饰有浮凸的姓名首字母的皮公事包。

sentences.english: Would you mind initialing this voucher?
sentences.chinese: 请在凭单上用首字母签名。

sentences.english: This is a letter paper personalized with his initials.
sentences.chinese: 这是一张有他姓名首字母的信纸。

sentences.english: The autocorrect engine does not correct the initial caps for words in this list.
sentences.chinese: 自动更正引擎不更正列表中单词的首字母。

sentences.english: Could you have my initials engraved on it?
sentences.chinese: 能把我名字的首字母刻上去吗？

sentences.english: The cattle are branded with the farmer's initials.
sentences.chinese: 这头牛被烙印著农人姓名的首字母。

sentences.english: You can use Chinese, first letter of pinyin or English to search.
sentences.chinese: 可以用汉字，第一个拼音首字母，或者英语进行查询。

sentences.english: Does your resume need new acronyms?
sentences.chinese: 履历表是否需要新的首字母缩写。

sentences.english: So that will be appearing in your text as "God" with a capital G.
sentences.chinese: 所以在你们书上，上帝的首字母是大写的。

sentences.english: Here are some common business titles and terms known commonly by their initials.
sentences.chinese: 下面就列举一些常见的商务职称和首字母缩写。

sentences.english: The cases are to be marked with our initials in a diamond as usual.
sentences.chinese: 装箱时唛头如常，为菱形图案中我方词首字母。

definition: to write characters in simplified form/the simplified form of a character/to abbreviate (a word or expression)/to write in simple language
Hanyu Pinyin, the romanization system used in the PRC since the 1960s
pronunciation/literary (rather than colloquial) pronunciation of a Chinese character
